overview:
Marvin Labod is the Front-End Developer at 6Wunderkinder. He builds the interfaces that Sebastian Scheerer designs. He loves to implement designs into vibrant and interactive web interfaces. In addition, he always has his eye on strong usability and logical user guidance. He is also responsible for the technical background of the 6Wunderkinder website and newsletter.

Prior to joining the 6W team, Marvin had his apprenticeship as a Media Designer for a Digital and Print company.
